Reviews.Title: An excellent combo pack
Reviews.Author: Wendy Pradels
Reviews.Content: We live in France and my husband was looking for a multi-purpose bridge type camera for filming theatre productions. We didn't have much time for shopping during our trip to the U.S. this summer, so we did the research via internet and purchased this pack with some apprehension. My husband had planned to go to a camera store and "talk to an expert" as he's always done in the past. But he's very pleased with his new camera and finds the choice of accessories very useful. And on top of it he saved time and effort, and Amazon delivered very quickly. We couldn't be more satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Lumix  FZ100
Reviews.Author: D. K. Esmer
Reviews.Content: Ease of use is 5 star.  But I am still learning what it can do.  Any pictures that have not turned out so far I would claim OE (operator error).  I just need to take some time and really accustom myself to it's possibilities.
